name: xi18n
description: Extracts i18n messages from source code.

options.name: project
options.description: The name of the project to build. Can be an app or a library.

options.name: configuration
options.description:
A named build target, as specified in the "configurations" section of angular.json.
Each named target is accompanied by a configuration of option defaults for that target.

options.name: prod
options.description:
When true, sets the build configuration to the production target.
All builds make use of bundling and limited tree-shaking, A production build also runs limited dead code elimination.

options.name: help
options.description: Shows a help message for this command in the console.

options.name: i18nFormat
options.description: Output format for the generated file.

options.name: i18nLocale
options.description: Specifies the source language of the application.

options.name: outputPath
options.description: Path where output will be placed.

options.name: outFile
options.description: Name of the file to output.
